summary: Teenager Melissa moves into a small town filled with racial prejudice and bullying, and each time she meets up with one of the boys in town, they end up murdered - but who is the killer?
cast: Bo Hopkins|Susan Strasberg|Patrick Macnee|Don Stroud|Dana Kimmell|Don Shanks|Aleisa Shirley|Steve Antin|Sharon Farrell|Logan Clarke|Michael Pataki|Henry Wilcoxon|Larry Storch|Michael Cutt|Glenn Withrow|Tony Perfit|Sandy Charles|Tim Cutt|Art Roberts
title: Sweet Sixteen
